verses.verse: (For the choir director; with stringed instruments. A Psalm. A Song.) God <WH430> be gracious <WH2603> to us and bless <WH1288> us, [And] cause His face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> upon us â€“ Selah. <WH5542>
That Thy way <WH1870> may be known <WH3045> on the earth, <WH776> Thy salvation <WH3444> among all <WH3605> nations. <WH1471>
Let the peoples <WH5971> praise <WH3034> Thee, O God; <WH430> Let all <WH3605> the peoples <WH5971> praise <WH3034> Thee.

Let the nations <WH3816> be glad <WH8055> and sing <WH7442> for joy; <WH7442> For Thou wilt judge <WH8199> the peoples <WH5971> with uprightness, <WH4334> And guide <WH5148> the nations <WH3816> on the earth. <WH776> Selah. <WH5542>
Let the peoples <WH5971> praise <WH3034> Thee, O God; <WH430> Let all <WH3605> the peoples <WH5971> praise <WH3034> Thee.
The earth <WH776> has yielded <WH5414> its produce; <WH2981> God, <WH430> our God, <WH430> blesses <WH1288> us.
God <WH430> blesses <WH1288> us, That all <WH3605> the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> may fear <WH3372> Him.
